TopicTitle: Root part decouples when I switch to vessel

Articles.Content:
Hello

When I have a root part that has a built in decoupler I have a problem that it will decouple when I switch to it from another vessel. I can launch it normally but if I switch to the space center and then back to the vessel it will decouple as soon as it is loaded. 

I use ksp 1.9.1 with the following mods:

Spoiler

[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 5.26)
ABookCase Orbital Reference System (ABCORS 0.5.1.2)
Action Groups Extended (AGExt 1:2.4.0.1)

That's a whole lotta mods...

Have you tried disabling the decoupler staging on root parts, or picking a different part as the root?
Check for anything funny in the action groups as well.
It works if I disable the decoupler and decouple it through the parts window so I just have to remember to disable it.

17 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

That's a whole lotta mods...

 

Thats a WHOLE LOTTA UNDERSTATEMENT......
